item.description: [[songs/t/the_prodigy/invaders_must_die/worlds_on_fire.md#three-two-one-zero-vyl-wnanory|It goes a one, two, three]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/skeptic.md#legend-bastard-vyl-wnanory|I was born with the hunger of a lion, the strength of a sun]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/skeptic.

item.title: Until It’s Gone
item.description: [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/ebbhead/ascend.md#if-all-i-ever-wanted-wasnt-good-for-you-vyl-wnanory|A fire needs a space to burn]] [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/ebbhead/ascend.md#if-all-i-ever-wanted-wasnt-good-for-you-vyl-wnanory|A breath to build a glow]] [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/ebbhead/ascend.md#if-all-i-ever-wanted-wasnt-good-for-you-vyl-wnanory|I’ve heard it said a thousand times]] [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/ebbhead/ascend.

item.title: Valentine’s Day
item.description: [[songs/d/disturbed/ten_thousand_fists/stricken.md#that-i-am-stricken-and-cant-let-you-go-vyl-wnanory|My insides all turned to ash]] [[songs/d/disturbed/ten_thousand_fists/stricken.md#that-i-am-stricken-and-cant-let-you-go-vyl-wnanory|So slow]] [[songs/d/disturbed/ten_thousand_fists/stricken.md#that-i-am-stricken-and-cant-let-you-go-vyl-wnanory|And blew away as I collapsed]] [[songs/d/disturbed/ten_thousand_fists/stricken.md#that-i-am-stricken-and-cant-let-you-go-vyl-wnanory|So cold]] [[songs/d/disturbed/ten_thousand_fists/stricken.md#that-i-am-stricken-and-cant-let-you-go-vyl-wnanory|A black wind took them away]] [[songs/d/disturbed/ten_thousand_fists/stricken.

item.title: Victimized
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.md#no-no-more-sorrow-vyl-wnanory|No regret for the confidence betrayed]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.md#no-no-more-sorrow-vyl-wnanory|No more hiding in shadow]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.md#no-no-more-sorrow-vyl-wnanory|‘Cause I won’t wait for the debt to be repaid]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.

item.title: Waiting for the End
item.description: [[songs/b/billy_idol/cyberpunk/adam_in_chains.md#theyve-broken-your-heart-vyl-wnanory|This is not the end, this is not the beginning]] [[songs/b/billy_idol/cyberpunk/adam_in_chains.md#theyve-broken-your-heart-vyl-wnanory|Just a voice like a riot rocking every revision]] [[songs/b/billy_idol/cyberpunk/adam_in_chains.

item.title: War
item.description: [[songs/m/mother_love_bone/apple/gentle_groove.md#one-two-vyl-wnanory|One, two]] [[songs/m/mother_love_bone/apple/gentle_groove.md#one-two-vyl-wnanory|One, two, thank you]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/snuff.md#so-if-you-love-me-let-me-go-vyl-wnanory|There’s no peace, only war]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/snuff.md#so-if-you-love-me-let-me-go-vyl-wnanory|Victory decides who’s wrong or right]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/snuff.md#so-if-you-love-me-let-me-go-vyl-wnanory|It will not cease, only grow]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/snuff.

item.title: Wastelands
item.description: [[songs/c/counterparts/prophets/isolation.md#the-best-news-ive-ever-heard-was-when-you-said-you-wouldnt-leave-vyl-wnanory|This is war with no weapons, marching with no stepping]] [[songs/c/counterparts/prophets/isolation.md#the-best-news-ive-ever-heard-was-when-you-said-you-wouldnt-leave-vyl-wnanory|Murder with no killing, illing every direction]] [[songs/c/counterparts/prophets/isolation.md#the-best-news-ive-ever-heard-was-when-you-said-you-wouldnt-leave-vyl-wnanory|First, no sequel, do the math, no equal]] [[songs/c/counterparts/prophets/isolation.

item.title: What I’ve Done
item.description: [[songs/c/caliban/ghost_empire/who_we_are.md#were-looking-forward-to-many-years-vyl-wnanory|In this farewell, there’s no blood, there’s no alibi]] [[songs/c/caliban/ghost_empire/who_we_are.md#were-looking-forward-to-many-years-vyl-wnanory|‘Cause I’ve drawn regret from the truth of a thousand lies]] [[songs/c/caliban/ghost_empire/who_we_are.

item.title: When They Come for Me
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/life_lessons_learned_the_hard_way.md#four-people-waited-in-a-random-white-unmarked-van-vyl-wnanory|Yeah]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/life_lessons_learned_the_hard_way.md#four-people-waited-in-a-random-white-unmarked-van-vyl-wnanory|I am not a pattern to be followed]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/life_lessons_learned_the_hard_way.md#four-people-waited-in-a-random-white-unmarked-van-vyl-wnanory|The pill that I’m on is a tough one to swallow]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/life_lessons_learned_the_hard_way.

item.title: Wisdom, Justice, and Love
item.description: [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/go_to_hell_for_heavens_sake.md#no-one-wants-to-hear-you-save-your-breath-vyl-wnanory|I come to this magnificent house of worship tonight]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/go_to_hell_for_heavens_sake.md#no-one-wants-to-hear-you-save-your-breath-vyl-wnanory|Because my conscience leaves me no other choice]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/go_to_hell_for_heavens_sake.md#no-one-wants-to-hear-you-save-your-breath-vyl-wnanory|A true revolution of values will lay hands on the world order and say of war]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/go_to_hell_for_heavens_sake.

item.title: With You
item.description: [[songs/r/revolting_cocks/cocked_and_loaded/pole_grinder.md#why-do-i-dance-vyl-wnanory|I woke up in a dream today]] [[songs/r/revolting_cocks/cocked_and_loaded/pole_grinder.md#why-do-i-dance-vyl-wnanory|To the cold of the static and put my cold feet on the floor]] [[songs/r/revolting_cocks/cocked_and_loaded/pole_grinder.

item.title: Wretches and Kings
item.description: [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/pretty_odd/mad_as_rabbits.md#come-save-me-from-walking-off-a-windowsill-vyl-wnanory|There’s a time when the operation of the machine becomes so odious]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/pretty_odd/mad_as_rabbits.md#come-save-me-from-walking-off-a-windowsill-vyl-wnanory|Makes you so sick at heart, that you can’t take part]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/pretty_odd/mad_as_rabbits.
